    • Method Detail

      • doesMapExists

        public boolean doesMapExists()
        Function that checks if the map has been found, loaded and stored
        Parameters:
        nothing -
        Returns:
        true if the map exists, false if not

      • movePlayer

        public GameEvent movePlayer(Player player,
                   java.lang.String destination)
        Function that executes the move request of a player. First if gets the starting position the movement, the destination, and tries to move Then, if the move is correct (if he hasn't move on -the same place as before or-the starting position or -his species' starting sector) it will change his position and set his alreadyMoved flag as true.
        Parameters:
        player - that wants to move, destination as String
        Returns:
        GameEvent related to that position, if the move is successful, else IllegalActionEvent

      • movePlayersOnTheStartingPositions

        public void movePlayersOnTheStartingPositions(java.util.List<Player> arrayOfPlayers)
        Function that sets the starting position of humans and aliens by looping through the players List and setting the positions based on what is set on the hexmap. It also generates the adjacent sector of that player
        Parameters:
        array - of players from the PlayerManager

      • generateAdjacentSectors

        public void generateAdjacentSectors(Player player)
        Function that sets the adjacents of that player by reading the char of it's position. If it's even (B,D, ecc) call getEventAdjacent, getOddAdjacent if otherwise. They both work with the player's position as the center one.
        Parameters:
        players - of which the adjacents are needed

      • getHumanStartingSector

        public Sector getHumanStartingSector()
        Function that gets the starting sector of a human on the gameboard
        Parameters:
        nothing -
        Returns:
        HumanStartingSector

      • getAlienStartingSector

        public Sector getAlienStartingSector()
        Function that gets the starting sector of an alien on the gameboard
        Parameters:
        nothing -
        Returns:
        AlienStartingSector

      • isInPositionOrAdjacent

        public static boolean isInPositionOrAdjacent(Sector toBeChecked,
                             Sector realCenter)
        Function that checks a sector is near a "center" one, or it's the same
        Parameters:
        sector - toBeChecked to be checked if near the "center" sector
        Returns:
        true if the sector to be checked is near the "center" one or it's the center.

        public GameBoard getMap()
